ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:06:36 [Issue ID 4000-47618] urn:comicvine:4000-47618 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 12:41:15. [Issue ID 64682]
ComicInfo.Summary: Super-Tough and Mace are re-united, and it is revealed that the two were lovers. Soon afterwards, an Atlantean army leads a very unsuccessful invasion of the Earth's surface. Cyberface (in BrainiApe's body AND in Overlord's armour) and his allies battle several Vicious Circle agents, a fight that is interrupted by both Dragon and the new Deadly Duo: Kill-Cat and Beast Boy. Before Dragon can defeat Cyberface, they are held at gunpoint by Hitler's brain.
